Texts.Chs: <entityname>
Texts.Eng: <entityname>

Texts.Chs: <entityname>是个有趣的名字。这让我想起了我们民族的哲学家杰夫。他想出了三明治制造者这个高尚的职业。
Texts.Eng: <entityname> is an interesting name. It reminds me of a philosopher of my people, Jeff. He came up with the noble profession of Sandwich Maker.

Texts.Chs: <entityname>! <entityname>! <entityname>! <entityname>!
Texts.Eng: <entityname>! <entityname>! <entityname>! <entityname>!
<entityname>! Nice to see you. We should have lunch sometime and discuss your stocks!

Texts.Chs: <entityname>，为什么你的死亡指数这么高？你是不是到处杀人？
Texts.Eng: <entityname>, why is it you have such a high body count? Do you just walk around murdering everything?

Texts.Chs: 不要相信违规记录。那是...另一个凯文。说实话。
Texts.Eng: Don't believe the infraction log. That was...a different Kevin. Honest.
Don't invest in Sigma-Tyovis at this point in time. Their market value is a bit too volatile. Futures projections are grim.
Earth? Never did get a chance to go there. I heard it was pretty nice.

Texts.Chs: 你曾经被肠子抱过吗？真是奇怪的安慰。
Texts.Eng: Have you ever been hugged by intestines? Oddly comforting, really.

Texts.Chs: 你有没有想过为什么你现在还活着？我一直都在这么做。
Texts.Eng: Have you ever wondered why you aren't currently dead? I do all the time.

Texts.Chs: 一个导尿袋能装下多少华夫饼？
Texts.Eng: How many waffles can you fit in a single catheter bag?

Texts.Chs: 真不敢相信居然没人注意到我的唇彩。
Texts.Eng: I can't believe nobody noticed the lip gloss...
I can't believe you killed the *entire* village.

Texts.Chs: 我可以以做三明治为职业，但这似乎太...平淡无奇了。
Texts.Eng: I could make a career out of sandwich making, but that seems so ....plain.
I find it exceptionally difficult to adjust to new gravity fields. I prefer artificial gravity like we have at home on the Novustech Arkology.
I guess it would depend on how they were added. Are they solid waffles? Liquified? Have they been garflipped?

Texts.Chs: 我已经说服了这里的一个员工，他应该会溜进你的船去看你睡觉。为了科学。我可能暗示过他你是不朽的。
Texts.Eng: I have convinced one of the staff here that they should sneak into your ship to watch you sleep. For science. I may have implied that you were immortal.
I have quite thoroughly mastered the art of placing smaller things into larger things. Few can surpass me in the art of stacking. It's not a particularly -useful- skill, but there you have it.
I lie all the time. By the way, I'm Kevin.

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢用超级有趣的东西装满公文包和盒子，然后卖掉。或者把它们送人！
Texts.Eng: I like filling briefcases and boxes with super fun things and then selling them. Or giving them away!
I long for the hunt, but my mind is far more valuable a tool.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经在一次放屁比赛中打败过一个Xar。这真的很难做到，因为我们的族人并没有屁股。
Texts.Eng: I once defeated a Xar in a farting contest. That's really hard to do, given that my people don't have buttcheeks.

Texts.Chs: 有一次我连续三个周期没穿裤子。那时我还年轻。
Texts.Eng: I once went without pants for 3 full cycles. This was during my earlier years.

Texts.Chs: 我将成为一名三明治制作者，就像我的父亲一样。但我选择了一条次一点的人生道路: 追寻知识。我会把做三明治的活计留给真正的大师。
Texts.Eng: I was to be a sandwich maker, like my father before me. But I chose a lesser path in life: Knowledge. I'll leave the sandwiches to true masters.
I wondered why humans looked uncomfortably when I asked if I could use a nutcracker on them. I later found out that human language has...interesting intricacies
I'd bet money on just about any wager if the stakes are right. Why, last Tuesday I made 4 million pixels from Kevin. I should probably be more concerned about this than I am.
I'd imagine somewhere between zero and thirty.

Texts.Chs: 我是<entityname>,<entityname>。你也肯定不是<entityname>。快改了你的名字，我可不想这么做。
Texts.Eng: I'm <entityname>,<entityname>. You cannot also be <entityname>. Change your name. I won't.
I'm Kevin. Everyone here hates me. This pleases me.
I'm Kevin. I am well loved around here.

Texts.Chs: 我十分敢肯定捅人有着医学上的应用。
Texts.Eng: I'm absolutely positive that there are medical applications to stabbing.
I'm debating on the merits of strange matter for my next amazing sculpture. Thoughts? And don't bother with that 'it's going to kill us all' nonsense.
I'm going to uncover this mystery, and the entire universe will thank me for it. Who doesn't love a waffle?

Texts.Chs: 我已经观察你很长时间了，<entityname>。你在空闲时间会做一些奇怪的事情。真的真的很奇怪。
Texts.Eng: I've been watching you for a very long time, <entityname>. You do really strange things in your free time. Really, really strange.
It even has an auto-failsafe in its quantum-state capacitor. The third of its kind! Of course, it isn't strictly ^red;legal^reset; by Protectorate standards...so lets keep that between us.

Texts.Chs: 这玩意闻起来像蘑菇，每个人看起来都想杀了我。就像我在家里一样！
Texts.Eng: It smells like mushrooms and everyone looks like they want to kill me. Just like home!

Texts.Chs: 当你穿裤子的时候，生活就少了27.3%的乐趣。快来证明我是错的。
Texts.Eng: Life is 27.3% less enjoyable when wearing pants. Prove me wrong.

Texts.Chs: 看，你已有一处已安装的mod冲突。快去看一下你的starbound.log。哈！就让你看一下。但是说真的，注意你的mod，笨蛋。
Texts.Eng: Look, you have a mod conflict installed. Go to your starbound.log and check. Hah! Made you look. But really, keep an eye on your mods, stupid.

Texts.Chs: 在满是卷须的田野中沉思，聆听一颗死亡星球的宁静哀号，这是冥想宇宙本质的最佳方式。相信我。
Texts.Eng: Meditating in a field of tendrils as you listen to the calming wails of a stillborn planet is the best way to meditate on the nature of the universe. Trust me.
Might we exchange pleasantries when I am not working? I have to complete this horticultural examination.
My Queen will return one day, and I shall rejoin the hive.

Texts.Chs: 没人爱你。除了我。和我一起工作。为什么？跳舞的迅猛龙。还需要我多说吗？
Texts.Eng: Nobody loves you. Except for me. Work with me. Why? Dancing velociraptors. Need I say more?
Recently I purchased a new FTL drive. This sweet baby is going to impress my Arkology so much!

Texts.Chs: 不要盯着我的胸肌看，<entityname>。
Texts.Eng: Stop staring at my pecs, <entityname>.

Texts.Chs: 那是我的“下水道”。我的眼睛在上面。对你来说，我的性别肯定没有那么重要。
Texts.Eng: That's my cloaca. My eyes are up here. Surely my gender cannot be that important to you.
There are exactly three stenches that get me excited. Four, now. The fourth is you.

Texts.Chs: 有三种类型的人。你是好人。我的意思是，口味方面。
Texts.Eng: There are three types of people. You're the good kind. Flavor-wise, I mean.
There is a universal conspiracy whispered that Mantizi invented bread. If we had invented bread, we would have first had to invent the universe.
There is no greater threat to sanity than boredom. Never let your mind be totally idle!

Texts.Chs: 仅仅用锤子是无法改变海星的性别的。这次你赢了，大自然。
Texts.Eng: There is no way to alter the gender of a starfish using only a hammer. You win this time, nature.

Texts.Chs: 说出来并不容易...所以我不说。
Texts.Eng: There's no easy way to say this...so I won't.

Texts.Chs: 不幸的是，你不能把武器藏在尿道里。我试过了。受试者总是很生气。
Texts.Eng: Unfortunately, you can't hide weapons in a urethra. I've tried. The subjects always get irate.

Texts.Chs: 什么？不，我绝对绝对绝对绝对不是上帝的化身。你为什么要暗示这样的事情？我还不够帅。
Texts.Eng: What? No, I am most certainly *not* an avatar of an Elder God. Why would you insinuate such a thing? I'm not handsome enough.
Where do you hail from? I don't see many folks like you around here.

Texts.Chs: 你不是那种把...白面包...和三明治一起吃的人吧？如果是这样的话，我们就不能做朋友。
Texts.Eng: You aren't one of those people that use...white bread...with their sandwiches, are you? We can't be friends if this is the case.
You look like you want to judge me. But I watched what you did using my infini-cam.

Texts.Chs: 你闻起来就像加布林。为什么？
Texts.Eng: You smell exactly like garflipps. Why?
You're a murderer.
